samples.Text: John Doe, a 32-year-old engineer, can be reached at johndoe@email.com.
The latest iPhone, the XS Max, is priced at $999 and comes in a 128GB version with a gold finish.
Sarah Johnson, a 28-year-old teacher, can be contacted at sarahj@email.com.
The new MacBook Pro, featuring the M1 chip, costs $1999 and comes with 16GB of memory in a silver finish.
Dr. Michael Smith can be reached at michaels@email.com.
The 11-inch iPad Pro, with 128GB of storage, is available in space gray and costs $799.
Emily Davis, a 31-year-old lawyer, can be reached at emilyd@email.com.
The AirPods Max, available in silver, costs $599.
David Brown, a 40-year-old manager, can be contacted at davidb@email.com.
The Apple Watch Series 6, with GPS, comes in a 40mm silver aluminum case and costs $399.
